data.system_settings: Discord Version 3.7.8 on Nexus 5x running Android 7.1.2 (public)
data.actual_result: Messages are not present for a while, even after typing new messages and receiving new messages from another user, then later appear
data.short_description: Messages appear in notifications when app is closed, dissapear and reappear when app is opened
data.steps_to_repro: - have a conversation in a channel - close app - receive notification of new messages - open app from notifications
